price: (129) And thus will We make some of the wrongdoers allies of others for what they used to earn.[343]
arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ نُوَلِّي بَعۡضَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ بَعۡضَۢا بِمَا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ
footnotes: [343]- Another interpretation pertaining to this world is "And thus do We make some of the wrongdoers allies of others for what they have been earning."

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wakadhālika nuwallī baʿḍa al-ẓālimīna baʿḍan bimā kānū yaksibūna
